itunes:title: Episode 512 - Special Guest Christmas Abbott
title: Episode 512 - Special Guest Christmas Abbott
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest and audience favorite Christmas Abbott as she discusses trying the impossibility of returning to elite level status as an athlete after having a child, getting arrested and ending up on TMZ, what it's...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest and audience favorite Christmas Abbott as she discusses trying the impossibility of returning to elite level status as an athlete after having a child, getting arrested and ending up on TMZ, what it's like to have a prolapsed anus, and why JT never had a chance when he invited her on a vacation.
